alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 3:27AM EST until March 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida and Southern Oneida counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... The snow may mix with sleet at times. Snowfall rates around an inch per hour are expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
